snippet: The magician Michael Carbonaro fools the unsuspecting in his new show, “The Carbonaro Effect,” on TruTV.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews ThruTV television series The Carbonaro Effect, featuring magician Michael Carbonaro.
lead_paragraph: The magician Michael Carbonaro fools the unsuspecting in his new show, “The Carbonaro Effect,” on TruTV.

headline.main: Think Seeing Is Believing? You’re Asking to Be Fooled
headline.print_headline: Think Seeing Is Believing? You’re Asking to Be Fooled
